attributes.action: Reduce Northern Rock variable rate in line with the recent .5% cut in base rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So the government owned Northern Rock only reduces the variable rate by .15 to 7.34% what does this do for the borrowers trapped by Northern Rock? Sign this petition to reduce the rate by a full .5%

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
